attributes.action: Impose sanctions on the terrorist state of Israel until Israel complies with UN resolutions, Geneva Conventions and International Law.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Israel should be prosecuted for war crimes against the Palestinians and forced to give back the land it has stolen from all of its neighbours. Israel must stop murdering, and jailing without trial, Palsetinians just because they disagree with the occupation.

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
